ai-tha-ap96:1.3_0: I have given it for a long time.
ai-tha-ap96:1.4_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap96:2.2_0: having the legal procedure of deed,
ai-tha-ap96:2.3_0: I’m free from dispassion, freed through (fading) knowledge,
ai-tha-ap96:2.4_0: they’ve attained the ending of defilements.
ai-tha-ap96:3.2_0: after the later time was announced,
ai-tha-ap96:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Seyyasaka.
ai-tha-ap96:7.1_0: for the fourth (of Spike), the fourth Elder Nun Sañjikāputta,
